655d-462a-95d3.name: Tandoori Spice
655d-462a-95d3.description: Fresh, fiery, and flavoursome. Authentically spiced tandoori chicken, hot & spicy curry sauce with paprika and crushed chillies. Topped with crisp green peppers, red onions and vine ripened tomatoes.

655d-462a-95d2.name: The Godfather Pizza
655d-462a-95d2.description: Gourmet Italian sausage, fresh garlic, onions & our hot giardiniera.

da8e-9f48-eac6.name: The Veggie Pizza
da8e-9f48-eac6.description: Vegetarian. Mushrooms, onions & green peppers with tomatoes on top.

b48e-4f29-a6eb.name: White Pizza
b48e-4f29-a6eb.description: Vegetarian. Olive oil, fresh garlic & sauteed spinach within the dough (no pizza sauce).

8566-40c0-b584.name: The Hawaiian Pizza
8566-40c0-b584.description: A blend of our special pizza & BBQ sauces, topped with Australian bacon, and pineapple.

9f7b-4d13-8d4a.name: Meat Mania Pizza
9f7b-4d13-8d4a.description: Gourmet Italian sausage, meatballs & pepperoni with turkey bacon on top.

1e5c-496d-8ace.name: Fabulous Four Pizza
1e5c-496d-8ace.description: Gourmet Italian saus, peppers, onions and red & green peppers.
